Question: In 1959 this person was expelled from Dartford "Tech" for truancy, and transferred to Sidcup Art College.
Hints: In August 2007 this person signed a publishing deal for his autobiography, Life, which was released 26 October 2010.
This person was tried in October 1978, pleading guilty to possession of heroin.
This person donated the fee for his involvement to the Climate Project, an organisation for raising environmental awareness.
